thought: To craft netherite_ingot, I need to first craft gold_ingot. Gold_ingot can be crafted by smelting gold_ore at slot 27. Since there are multiple gold_ores, I will only smelt one at a time. I will move the gold_ore from slot 27 to slot 11 and smelt it into slot 0.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 27 to slot 11 with quantity 1
